channel.title: eagle on Greg Herlein
channel.description: Recent content in eagle on Greg Herlein

item.title: Boards!
item.description: I’m building a robotics board that basically is a WiFi REST interface to a variety of I2C sensors - the I2C side uses an I2C switch driven by an ESP32. My first RBOT board arrived, but alas, I got schooled on surface mount part numbering.

item.title: ESP32-PICO-KIT-V4 Eagle Library
item.description: An Eagle part library to support use of the ESP32-PICO-KIT-V4 as a daughterboard.
